Board of Trustees

Meet the Board of Trustees who lead and inspire Dee-Best Fashion House.

Okuroteinyim Isokariari

Founder and CEO

Okuroteinyim Isokariari is the visionary founder and CEO of Dee-Best Fashion House. With a passion for innovative design and a keen eye for detail, Okuroteinyim has transformed the fashion industry with his unique and cutting-edge creations. Under his leadership, Dee-Best Fashion House has become synonymous with luxury, elegance, and modernity. Okuroteinyim's commitment to sustainability and ethical practices has set new standards in the industry, inspiring countless designers and fashion enthusiasts around the world. His dedication to excellence and relentless pursuit of perfection continue to drive the brand's success and global recognition.

Precious Akpode

Chief Technical Officer

Precious Akpode brings a wealth of knowledge in technology and IT management. He has led several successful digital transformation projects in both the private and public sectors.

Chukwuebuka Olisa

Chief Financial Officer

Chukwuebuka Olisa, the Chief Financial Officer, oversees all financial operations at Dee-Best. With a background in corporate finance and a keen eye for detail, he ensures the company’s financial stability and growth.

Zain Oladiran

Chief legal Officer

Zain Oladiran is a seasoned legal expert with a focus on corporate governance and compliance. He has a track record of providing sound legal advice to multinational corporations and non-profit organizations.

Rosestone Abundance

Chief Operating Officer

Rosestone Abundance, the Chief Operating Officer, manages the daily operations of Dee-Best. His expertise in logistics and supply chain management ensures that every product reaches customers efficiently and on time.

Loya Michael Otega

President

As president, Loyal Michael Otega plays a pivotal role in steering the company’s overall direction and maintaining its core values. His leadership and industry insight keep Dee-Best ahead of fashion trends.

Philips Adepoju

Head of Marketing

Philips Adepoju leads the marketing team with a dynamic approach to brand promotion. His campaigns have significantly boosted Dee-Best global presence and customer engagement.

Akhihiero Okhai Hope

Head of Sales

Akhihiero Okhai Hope, as the Head of Sales, drives the company's revenue growth through strategic sales initiatives. His expertise in market analysis and customer relationship management is invaluable to Dee-Best success.

Julius O Olanipekun

Treasurer

As treasurer, Julius O Olanipekun manages Dee-Best’s financial assets and investments. His meticulous financial planning and analysis help secure the company’s future growth and stability.

Ejemot Inyang Ejemot

Head of HR

Ejemot Inyang Ejemot, the Head of Human Resources, cultivates a positive and productive work environment at Dee-Best. His dedication to employee development and organizational culture is key to the company’s success.
